description:
Fun terrain is sometimes unkind to your tires and tubes. Carrying a VP-1 patch kit could save the day and get you back riding.

  • Includes 6 patches, sandpaper and self-vulcanizing fluid
  • 2, 20mm diameter round patches
  • 2, 25mm diameter round patches
  • 2, 25mm x 35mm oval patches
name: Park Tool VP-1 Vulcanizing Patch Kit
